children.text: Insert information of the player you'd like to add below

children.onClick: {{Post_New_Player.run(() => showAlert('Successfully posted a new player','success'), () => showAlert('Could not post a new player','error'))}}

children.label: enter either: pg, sg, sf, pf, c

children.text: Update the information of the player you'd like to update below based on player id

children.onClick: {{Put_Player.run(() => showAlert('Successfully updated player information','success'), () => showAlert('Could not update information for given player','error'))}}

children.label: enter either: pg, sg, sf, pf, c

children.text: Delete information of the player you'd like to delete below

children.onClick: {{Delete_Player.run(() => showAlert('Successfully deleted a player','success'), () => showAlert('Could not delete player','error'))}}
